scripts.update:typings:backend: rm -rf ./backend/src/schema/* && node ./scripts/update-typings.js --srcPath ./specs/todo-app-spec.json --destPath ./backend/src/schema --separatedFiles true && cd ./backend/src/schema && git add * && cd ../..
scripts.update:typings:frontend: rm -rf ./app/api/* && node ./scripts/update-typings.js --srcPath ./specs/todo-app-spec.json --destPath ./app/api --separatedFiles true && cd ./app/api && git add * && cd ../..
scripts.update:typings: npm run update:typings:backend && npm run update:typings:frontend
